Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses temp. rerouted near 63rd/ Cottage Grove.

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 63rd/Cottage Grove due to Festival near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Indiana, 61st, Cottage Grove, 64th, Maryland and 63rd including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, Cottage Gove, 61st, Prairie and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #43 43rd Reroute near Root/Stewart
ShortDescription: Westbound 43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace, Root and 43rd: due to, street blockage near Root/Stewart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Westbound #43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 43rd, Wallace, Root, 43rd and over regular route, due to street blockage near Root/Stewart.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Service Delayed Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to track conditions. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are standing Clark/Lake due to track conditions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
